title: Moncton restaurants adapt to COVID-19 concerns
description: At least one restaurant owner in Moncton is taking extra precautions after the province’s first case of COVID-19 was confirmed in a resident who lives in the area.
content: At least one restaurant owner in Moncton is taking extra precautions after the province s first case of COVID was confirmed in a resident who lives in the area This means additional cleaning and fewer tables in dining areas in hopes that customers keep c chars
